Pre-Game Insights: Australia have been formidable in all formats recently and with England's opening game getting washed out, our prediction says that the Baggy Greens are going to eclipse the Three Lions.
Jos Buttler will be aware of the Aussie challenge and will need to refind their attacking Bazball style that worked so well for them if they fancy a chance of successfully defending their title.
